archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0274
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I make a purchase, I want to be able to track how my order is progressing either via the app or web self service

properties.value: In which details you would like to see this? Information about delivery (link to the courier page). Information that order is waiting for neighbour consent. Information that something went wrong The customer could ask a question at any point of order, this should be redirected to the corresponding group based on the current step of the order. Individual order items need to be tracked seperatelly. Would be good to have a seperate session about order tracker (based on flows defined on MIro)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
